preparation_duration_ms.description: How long the 'get ready' message before each trial is shown, milliseconds.

blank_grid_duration_ms.description: How long a blank grid is shown before the dots appear, milliseconds.

interference_duration_ms.description: How long the grid of interference targets is shown, milliseconds.

interference_transition_animation.description: Should the transitions between dot presentation, interference, and recall be animated slide transitions?

dot_present_duration_ms.description: How long the dots are shown, milliseconds.

number_of_interference_targets.description: How many targets to show in the interference phase.

show_trials_complete_scene.description: After the final trial, should a completion scene be shown? Otherwise, the game will immediately end.

instruction_type.description: Type of instructions to show, 'short' or 'long'.

instructions.description: When non-null, an InstructionsOptions object that will completely override the built-in instructions.

show_quit_button.description: Should the activity quit button be shown?

show_locale_picker.description: Should the icon that allows the participant to switch the locale be shown?

scoring.description: Should scoring data be generated? Default is false.

study_id.description: The short human-readable text ID of the study (protocol, experiment, or other aggregate) that contains the administration of this activity.

study_uuid.description: Unique identifier of the study (protocol, experiment, or other aggregate) that contains the administration of this activity.

document_uuid.description: Unique identifier for this data document.

session_uuid.description: Unique identifier for all activities in this administration of the session. This identifier changes each time a new session starts.

activity_uuid.description: Unique identifier for all trials in this administration of the activity. This identifier changes each time the activity starts.

activity_publish_uuid.description: Persistent unique identifier of the activity. This identifier never changes. It can be used to identify the activity across different studies and sessions.

device_timezone.description: Timezone of the device. Calculated from Intl.DateTimeFormat().resolvedOptions().timeZone.

device_timezone_offset_minutes.description: Difference in minutes between UTC and device timezone. Calculated from Date.getTimezoneOffset().

locale.description: Locale of the trial. null if the activity does not support localization.

activity_begin_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the beginning of the game activity.

trial_begin_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the beginning of the trial. Null if trial was skipped.

trial_end_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the end of the trial (when user presses 'Done' after placing the three objects). Null if trial was skipped.

trial_index.description: Index of the trial within this assessment, 0-based.

response_time_duration_ms.description: Milliseconds from the when the empty grid is shown in the recall phase until the user has placed all dots and taps the done button. Null if trial was skipped.

presented_cells.description: Randomly chosen locations of the dots presented to the user. Null if trial was skipped.

selected_cells.description: User selected locations of the dots. Null if trial was skipped.

user_dot_actions.description: Complete user dot actions: placement, removal, and done. Null if trial was skipped.

elapsed_duration_ms.description: Duration, milliseconds, from when dot recall scene fully appeared until this user action.

action_type.description: Was the action a dot placement, dot removal, or done button push?

cell.description: Cell of user action; null if non-applicable (user action was done button push).

tap_x.description: X coordinate of user's tap on the cell, relative to the cell.

tap_y.description: Y coordinate of user's tap on the cell, relative to the cell.

user_interference_actions.description: User actions tapping the interference targets. Null if trial was skipped.

elapsed_duration_ms.description: Duration, milliseconds, from when interference scene fully appeared until this user action.

action_type.description: Was the action on an interference target or off?

tap_x.description: X coordinate of user's tap on the cell, relative to the cell.

tap_y.description: Y coordinate of user's tap on the cell, relative to the cell.

number_of_correct_dots.description: Number of dots that were correctly placed. Null if trial was skipped.

study_id.description: The short human-readable text ID of the study (protocol, experiment, or other aggregate) that contains the administration of this activity.

study_uuid.description: Unique identifier of the study (protocol, experiment, or other aggregate) that contains the administration of this activity.

document_uuid.description: Unique identifier for this data document.

session_uuid.description: Unique identifier for all activities in this administration of the session. This identifier changes each time a new session starts.

activity_uuid.description: Unique identifier for all trials in this administration of the activity. This identifier changes each time the activity starts.

activity_publish_uuid.description: Persistent unique identifier of the activity. This identifier never changes. It can be used to identify the activity across different studies and sessions.

device_timezone.description: Timezone of the device. Calculated from Intl.DateTimeFormat().resolvedOptions().timeZone.

device_timezone_offset_minutes.description: Difference in minutes between UTC and device timezone. Calculated from Date.getTimezoneOffset().

locale.description: Locale of the trial. null if the activity does not support localization.

activity_begin_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the beginning of the game activity.

first_trial_begin_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the beginning of the first trial. Null if no trials were completed.

last_trial_end_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the end of the last trial. Null if no trials were completed.

n_trials_exact_targets.description: Number of trials in which the user selected the exact target cells without error.

flag_trials_match_expected.description: Does the number of completed and expected trials match? 1 = true, 0 = false.

distance_hausdorff_median.description: Median across all trials of the Hausdorff distance between the presented and selected cells within a trial.

sum_exact_targets.description: Sum of the number of exact targets across all trials. An exact target is a target that was selected in the correct location.
